title: Research Engineer - Machine Learning
content:
주요 업무
                    [English Resume is required! 영문 이력서로 보내주세요!]Design, build, train and test Machine Learning and Deep Learning perception model such as segmentation, classification, detection, tracking, and predict…
            더 보기
            [English Resume is required! 영문 이력서로 보내주세요!]Design, build, train and test Machine Learning and Deep Learning perception model such as segmentation, classification, detection, tracking, and prediction.

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          Python
          C++
          PyTorch
          TensorFlow
          scikit-learn

채용 상세
                    [Responsibilities]-Design, build, train and test Machine Learning and Deep Learning perception model such as segmentation, classification, detection, tracking, and prediction- Optimize and deliver…
            더 보기
            [Responsibilities]-Design, build, train and test Machine Learning and Deep Learning perception model such as segmentation, classification, detection, tracking, and prediction- Optimize and deliver algorithm as code product for high-performance perception software[Qualification]-B.S., M.S. or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Machine learning or related technical field with 2+ years of industry or research experience developing ML models- Fluency in Python and C++ and ML libraries like Scikit-learn, Tensorflow, PyTorch,  etc- Deep understanding of fundamental Machine Learning (such as SVM, tree-based models, clustering, … ) and Deep Learning. - Experience with modern computer vision techniques such as object segmentation and detection- Proven ability to quickly and effectively turn research ML papers into working code- Strong mathematics skills - linear algebra, optimization, probability, and statistics.[Preferences]-Experience in robot perception using 3D pointclouds such as LiDAR, RADAR- Experience with GPU programming- Experience in Deep Neural Network optimization such as model quantization- Publications in your field (especially CVPR, ICCV, RSS, ICRA)
